bugChannelMessage:
React below to report a bug!
Note: If the bug report is filled out incorrectly it will be denied.
questions: Give a short summary of your bug.
List the steps used to recreate this bug.
What is the expected result of performing this action?
What is the actual result of this action?
Do you have any additional info such as an error message or screenshot? (reply 'none' if not)
There can only be a total of 5 questions!
